Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Clarifies the definition of "tenant" to exclude squatters
Summary: Extends the time period for tenancy rights from 30 days to 45 days of possession; adds squatting to the definition of criminal trespass in the third degree.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
LawCode: Amd ยง711, RPAP L; amd ยง140.10, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law and the penal law, in relation to clarifying the definition of "tenant" to exclude squatters
